title: Waiting MINUTES for post-game results with new client..help!
body: I don't have an issue with the client itself. The only issue is that I have to wait literally MINUTES for the results page to appear after a game. By the time I get into the results screen, everyone has already left lobby and i can't talk to anyone how the game went. I believe it's because of all the animations, etc. I have low-specs mode on, but it still literally takes 3-4 minutes to load the results page and it is beyond frustrating. Any tips on how I can shorten that??

replies.body: This might be because you have [Close client during game](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) enabled in your client options.  This will result in relaunching the client after the game ends, which may take a little longer than already having it up.  Disabling the option should help with speeding things up!
I will give it a try.  Thanks a ton for the help!
This happens to me almost every single game and it will usually end up crashing. Only happens with the new client.
